subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: An object defining configuration properties for the Gallery UI component.

subMembers.name: activeStateEnabled
subMembers.description: A Boolean value specifying whether or not the UI component changes its state when interacting with a user.

subMembers.name: animationDuration
subMembers.description: The time, in milliseconds, spent on slide animation.

subMembers.name: animationEnabled
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not to animate the displayed item change.

subMembers.name: dataSource
subMembers.type: String | Array<String, dxGalleryItem, any> | Store | DataSource | DataSource_Options | null

subMembers.name: indicatorEnabled
subMembers.description: A Boolean value specifying whether or not to allow users to switch between items by clicking an indicator.

subMembers.name: initialItemWidth
subMembers.description: Specifies the width of an area used to display a single image.

subMembers.name: loop
subMembers.description: A Boolean value specifying whether or not to scroll back to the first item after the last item is swiped.

subMembers.name: selectedIndex
subMembers.description: The index of the currently active gallery item.

subMembers.name: showIndicator
subMembers.description: A Boolean value specifying whether or not to display an indicator that points to the selected gallery item.

subMembers.name: showNavButtons
subMembers.description: A Boolean value that specifies the availability of the "Forward" and "Back" navigation buttons.

subMembers.name: slideshowDelay
subMembers.description: The time interval in milliseconds, after which the gallery switches to the next item.

subMembers.name: stretchImages
subMembers.description: Specifies if the UI component stretches images to fit the total gallery width.

subMembers.name: swipeEnabled
subMembers.description: A Boolean value specifying whether or not to allow users to switch between items by swiping.

subMembers.name: wrapAround
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not to display parts of previous and next images along the sides of the current image.

properties.name: dxGallery
properties.description: The Gallery is a UI component that displays a collection of images in a carousel. The UI component is supplied with various navigation controls that allow a user to switch between images.

Events.name: onContentReady
Events.description: A function that is executed when the UI component is rendered and each time the component is repainted.

Events.name: onDisposing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is [disposed of].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#dispose').

Events.name: onInitialized
Events.description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the UI component instance.

Events.name: onItemClick
Events.description: A function that is executed when a collection item is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: onItemContextMenu
Events.description: A function that is executed when a collection item is right-clicked or pressed.

Events.name: onItemHold
Events.description: A function that is executed when a collection item has been held for a [specified period].

Events.name: onItemRendered
Events.description: A function that is executed after a collection item is rendered.

Events.name: onOptionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after a UI component property is changed.

Events.name: onSelectionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed when a collection item is selected or selection is canceled.

Types.name: ContentReadyEvent
Types.description: The type of the [contentReady] event handler's argument.

Types.name: DisposingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [disposing] event handler's argument.

Types.name: InitializedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [initialized] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ItemClickEvent
Types.description: The type of the [itemClick] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ItemContextMenuEvent
Types.description: The type of the [itemContextMenu] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ItemHoldEvent
Types.description: The type of the [itemHold] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ItemRenderedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [itemRendered] event handler's argument.

Types.name: OptionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [optionChanged] event handler's argument.

Types.name: SelectionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [selectionChanged] event handler's argument.
